sentences.en: "Probably," agreed Hunter, with a slow nod of his head.
sentences.cn: 亨特慢慢点了点头,表示赞同地说:“很有可能.”

sentences.en: "Why didn't you tell me before?" asked Hunter harshly.
sentences.cn: “你为什么不早告诉我？”亨特厉声问道。

sentences.en: Before the hunter could take aim , the deer jumped out of sight.
sentences.cn: 在猎手瞄准前, 鹿已经逃了.
海军五星上将威廉∙亨特

sentences.en: Hunter knew nearly all of this already.
sentences.cn: 这事亨特几乎已全知道了。

sentences.en: Hunter nodded again and gazed upwards in fear.
sentences.cn: 亨特又点了点头，满眼恐惧地朝上望去。

sentences.en: I majored in psychology at Hunter College.
sentences.cn: 在亨特学院求学时，我主修心理学。

sentences.en: The governors were joined by Mr Hunter and his management team.
sentences.cn: 亨特先生及他率领的管理小组加入了州长们的队伍。

sentences.en: The hunter hit at a deer with his gun.
The hunter knelt beside the animal carcass and commenced to skin it.
sentences.cn: 猎人跪在动物尸体旁边，开始剥皮。

sentences.en: The hunter was trampled to death by a wild elephant.
sentences.cn: 那猎人被一头野象踩死了.

sentences.en: The hunter-gatherer lifestyle today survives precariously in remote regions.
sentences.cn: 今天狩猎采集的生活方式在偏远地区侥幸留存了下来。

sentences.en: The tiger was enmeshed in the web laid by hunter.
sentences.cn: 老虎缠在猎人布下的网里.

sentences.en: When the deer saw the hunter, it made off at once.
sentences.cn: 鹿一见到猎人, 就立刻跑掉了.

phrases.tran_cn: 四处觅购便宜货的人；杀价购买股票的投机商
为获赏金捕人的人；[俚]领取佣金的代理商
城市猎人（一卡通片名称）

trans.tran_cn: 猎人，猎犬，猎狐马，猎食其他动物的野兽，亨特
trans.tran_en: a person who hunts wild animals, or an animal that hunts other animals for food
